frontmatter.description: Elasticsearch is an open source distributed full-text search and analytics engine. It supports RESTful operations and allows you to store, search, and analyze big volumes of data in real time.
frontmatter.title: Install Elasticsearch 7.0.0 on Ubuntu 18.04

frontmatter.description: The following tutorial uses a package manager to install MongoDB 4.2 Community Edition on LTS Ubuntu 18.04 Linux systems.
frontmatter.title: Install MongoDB Community Edition on Ubuntu 18.04
